parts.text: {"word":"desacostumbrarse","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"pronominal","definition":"慣れなくなる、習慣をなくす、以前の習慣を忘れる","english_definition":"to become unaccustomed to something; to lose a habit; to forget a previous habit.","examples":[{"sentence":"Me he desacostumbrado a madrugar.","translation":"早起きする習慣がなくなってしまった。","english_translation":"I've become unaccustomed to getting up early."},{"sentence":"Después de vivir en la ciudad, me desacostumbré al silencio del campo.","translation":"都会に住んだ後、田舎の静けさに慣れなくなった。","english_translation":"After living in the city, I became unaccustomed to the silence of the countryside."},{"sentence":"Con el tiempo, uno se desacostumbra a las malas noticias.","translation":"時間が経つにつれて、人は悪いニュースに慣れなくなる。","english_translation":"Over time, one becomes unaccustomed to bad news."}],"collocations":["desacostumbrarse a algo (慣れなくなる)","desacostumbrarse a hacer algo (～する習慣がなくなる)"],"synonyms":["olvidar","perder la costumbre","deshabituarse"],"antonyms":["acostumbrarse","habituarse"],"conjugation":{"present":{"yo":"me desacostumbro","tú":"te desacostumbras","él/ella/usted":"se desacostumbra","nosotros/nosotras":"nos desacostumbramos","vosotros/vosotras":"os desacostumbráis","ellos/ellas/ustedes":"se desacostumbran"},"preterite":{"yo":"me desacostumbré","tú":"te desacostumbraste","él/ella/usted":"se desacostumbró","nosotros/nosotras":"nos desacostumbramos","vosotros/vosotras":"os desacostumbrasteis","ellos/ellas/ustedes":"se desacostumbraron"},"imperfect":{"yo":"me desacostumbraba","tú":"te desacostumbrabas","él/ella/usted":"se desacostumbraba","nosotros/nosotras":"nos desacostumbrábamos","vosotros/vosotras":"os desacostumbrabais","ellos/ellas/ustedes":"se desacostumbraban"},"future":{"yo":"me desacostumbraré","tú":"te desacostumbrarás","él/ella/usted":"se desacostumbrará","nosotros/nosotras":"nos desacostumbraremos","vosotros/vosotras":"os desacostumbraréis","ellos/ellas/ustedes":"se desacostumbrarán"},"conditional":{"yo":"me desacostumbraría","tú":"te desacostumbrarías","él/ella/usted":"se desacostumbraría","nosotros/nosotras":"nos desacostumbraríamos","vosotros/vosotras":"os desacostumbraríais","ellos/ellas/ustedes":"se desacostumbrarían"},"subjunctive_present":{"yo":"me desacostumbre","tú":"te desacostumbres","él/ella/usted":"se desacostumbre","nosotros/nosotras":"nos desacostumbremos","vosotros/vosotras":"os desacostumbréis","ellos/ellas/ustedes":"se desacostumbren"},"subjunctive_imperfect":{"yo":"me desacostumbrara/desacostumbrase","tú":"te desacostumbraras/desacostumbrases","él/ella/usted":"se desacostumbrara/desacostumbrase","nosotros/nosotras":"nos desacostumbráramos/desacostumbrásemos","vosotros/vosotras":"os desacostumbrarais/desacostumbraseis","ellos/ellas/ustedes":"se desacostumbraran/desacostumbrasen"},"imperative":{"tú":"desacostúmbrate","usted":"desacostúmbrese","nosotros/nosotras":"desacostumbrémonos","vosotros/vosotras":"desacostumbraos","ustedes":"desacostúmbrense"}}},"etymology":{"value":"De 'des-' (prefijo de negación), 'a-' (prefijo que indica dirección o inicio), 'costumbre' (hábito, uso) y '-arse' (sufijo pronominal).","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/desa.ko.stumˈbɾaɾse/","syllables":"de-sa-cos-tum-bra-rse"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"'Desacostumbrarse' is a pronominal verb, meaning it requires a reflexive pronoun (me, te, se, nos, os, se) to be used correctly. It expresses the idea of losing a habit or becoming unaccustomed to something that was once familiar. It often implies a gradual process.","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"Yo desacostumbro a levantarme tarde.","correct":"Yo me desacostumbro a levantarme tarde.","note":"The reflexive pronoun is essential with this verb."},{"incorrect":"Desacostumbrar a algo.","correct":"Desacostumbrarse a algo.","note":"The infinitive form must also include the reflexive pronoun."}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["acostumbrar (to accustom)","costumbre (custom, habit)","desacostumbrado (unaccustomed)"],"phrases":["desacostumbrarse a la idea (to get used to the idea)"],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"level":"B2","frequency_corpus":"Low frequency"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B2","text":"The verb 'desacostumbrarse' is used to describe the process of losing a habit or becoming unfamiliar with something. It's a reflexive verb, so it always needs a reflexive pronoun. The level is B2 because it requires understanding of reflexive verbs and nuanced vocabulary related to habits and routines."},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Después de la jubilación, me desacostumbré a usar traje.","translation":"After retirement, I became unaccustomed to wearing a suit.","type":"example","meaning_category":"Losing a habit"},{"sentence":"Si dejas de estudiar español, te desacostumbrarás rápidamente.","translation":"If you stop studying Spanish, you will quickly become unaccustomed to it.","type":"example","meaning_category":"Becoming unfamiliar"},{"sentence":"Uno nunca se desacostumbra al cariño de la familia.","translation":"One never gets unaccustomed to the affection of family.","type":"example","meaning_category":"Losing a habit (negative)"}]}
